subject: Soccer
Gold Cup (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: Chris Wondolowski scored two goals to raise his total to five in two matches for the United States, which will very likely have its quarterfinal in Baltimore on July 21.
snippet: Chris Wondolowski scored two goals to raise his total to five in two matches for the United States, which will very likely have its quarterfinal in Baltimore on July 21.
